lead_paragraph: Handing out chocolates to the media has become a year-end tradition for Novak Djokovic at the ATP World Tour Finals but there was no doubting the latter half of the 2016 season has been anything but sweet for the once all-conquering Serb.
snippet: Handing out chocolates to the media has become a year-end tradition for Novak Djokovic at the ATP World Tour Finals but there was no doubting the latter half of the 2016 season has been anything but sweet for the once all-conquering Serb....

headline.main: Eclipsed Djokovic Gets Bitter Taste of Failure
headline.print_headline: Eclipsed Djokovic Gets Bitter Taste of Failure
